official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the week of December 12, 1982, through December 18, 1982, as "National Drunk and Drugged Driving Awareness Week".

summary.text: Designates December 12 through December 18, 1982, as National Drunk and Drugged Driving Awareness Week.
